Package models

Class Student

java.lang.Object
models.User
models.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
InternshipViewer, StudentActions
public class Student extends User implements StudentActions, InternshipViewer
Represents a student user who can apply for internships and manage applications. Implements student-specific actions and internship viewing capabilities.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class models.User

    name, password, userID
